name: Chromadrome 2
description: Race across the Quantum Universe on super-fast race tracks in the simple, hypnotically beautiful and maddeningly addictive Chromadrome 2! All you have to do is try to stay on the perfectly straight race tracks!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 32Mb DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
